data.title: La Land Records
data.meta_description: La-La Land Records, where soundtracks live
data.text:
OUR BIGGEST SALE IN YEARS!!! – 30% OFF YOUR ENTIRE ORDER OF IN-STOCK ITEMS!!! INCLUDES our NEW RELEASE OF “STAR TREK 1701 COLLECTION VOL 6”

EXCLUDES “THE SUGARLAND EXPRESS” & “THE LAST ACTION HERO”

The 30% DISCOUNT will be applied to your order at checkout. ORDERS MAY NOT BE COMBINED WITH PREVIOUS OR EXISTING ORDERS. Special offer runs thru 8/30.

GOING OUT OF PRINT ALERT!!! GLORY (2-CD SET)– LESS THAN 250 REMAIN

(GLORY goes out of print 9/1/24)

STAR TREK 1701 COLLECTION VOL 1 – LESS THAN 200 REMAIN

SCARFACE 40th ANNIV 2XLP VINYL “WHITE YEYO” – LESS THAN 150 REMAIN

THE BURBS– LESS THAN 150 REMAIN

SUPERGIRL SEASON 3– LESS THAN 60 REMAIN

NOTE: NEW ORDERS MAY NOT BE COMBINED WITH PREVIOUS OR CURRENT ORDERS.

NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS: Customer is responsible for any new and/or additional fees imposed by their territory upon receiving their parcel.

Expect 10 business days from the date you place your order for it to ship from our warehouse and, then, we respectfully ask customers to wait up to 4 weeks to inquire about packages/deliveries not yet received. All such inquiries should be made to info@lalaland-ent.com – Thank you

LAST CALL!!! GOING OUT OF PRINT!!! WUTHERING HEIGHTS by Ryuichi Sakamoto (Less than 35 remain). When they are gone, they're GONE!

KARATE KID 40th ANNIVERSARY SPECIAL!!! Celebrate 40 years of THE KARATE KID with 40% OFF our awesome in-stock KARATE KID and COBRA KAI CDs!

THE KARATE KID (LAST BATCH), THE NEXT KARATE KID, COBRA KAI SEASON 3 and COBRA KAI SEASON 5 are ONLY $13 EACH!

COBRA KAI SEASON 1 IS ONLY $10 EACH!

BACK IN STOCK! - STAR TREK II THE WRATH OF KHAN (2-CD SET) by James Horner!

ORDER “THE SUGARLAND EXPRESS” CD NOW!!!

Presenting our twenty first-title in our UNIVERSAL PICTURES FILM MUSIC CLASSICS COLLECTION – the WORLD PREMIERE release of John Williams’ THE SUGARLAND EXPRESS!!! Limited Edition CD is available to ORDER NOW.

A Limited Edition VINYL LP release is forthcoming. More info soon.

LA-LA LAND in collaboration with SPARKS AND SHADOWS is proud to exclusively offer a limited amount of autographed CDs of the Second Volume of composer Bear McCreary’s original score to the hit Netflix series MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE: REVELATION!

GET YOUR AUTOGRAPHED CD NOW of MASTERS OF THE UNIVERSE: REVELATION (ORIGINAL SERIES SOUNDTRACK) – VOLUME 2, exclusively from La-La Land Records!

LIVE CONCERT DVD! Just added! John Debney's "THE PASSION ORATORIO"! ONLY $9.98
